title: Remco Evenepoel Battles Burnout as Grueling Season Takes Toll: ‘My Batteries are Starting to Run Out’
content:
Downturn in form at end of sensational 2024 puts Evenepoel's chances for end-of-year showdown with Pogačar at Il Lombardia in jeopardy.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel Battles Burnout as Grueling Season Takes Toll: ‘My Batteries are Starting to Run Out’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
